content: from * until you reach the bor repeat this round for three more rounds then bobble in pattern with a loose bind off page 7 © maven crafted designs iris mitts share your work if you have any questions please feel free to reach out to me please do not alter or resell this pattern this pattern may not be used for mass productions but you can use it to make small batch items for sale once you finish your beautiful new gloves remember to tag me on social media so i can see and share your work @mavencrafted on instagram mavencrafted on ravelry enjoy use #irismitts and #mavencrafted on your pictures so i can see your work tap here to view more patterns from maven crafted page 8 © maven crafted designs
